Name: Smoked Appletini
Ingredients: 15 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice. Smoke with apple and pecan (or other wood) and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Apple and honey with hints of lemon and clove spice.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2012 by Michael Stringer, Flip-It! Mixology, London.
Nutrition: One serving of Smoked Appletini contains 189 calories
